official_title: To amend chapters 83 and 84 of title 5, United States Code, to make applicable to mine safety and health inspectors certain provisions which are currently applicable to law enforcement officers.

summary.text: Includes mine safety and health (MSHA) inspectors within Civil Service and Federal Employees' Retirement Systems provisions applicable to law enforcement officers providing for: (1) payroll deductions; (2) mandatory separation; and (3) annuity eligibility. Defines a MSHA inspector as any person appointed as an authorized representative of the Secretary of Labor under the Federal Mine Safety and Health Act of 1977.

titles.title: To amend chapters 83 and 84 of title 5, United States Code, to make applicable to mine safety and health inspectors certain provisions which are currently applicable to law enforcement officers.
